title: Ladies and gentlemen...Mr Leonard Cohen
creator_credit: Don Owen, Donald Brittain, John Kemeny and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Presents an informal portrait of the Montreal poet, Leonard Cohen, on the platform reading to his audience, at other times alone, or with family or friends. Among his writings are a novel, THE FAVOURED GAME and two books of poems, SPICE BOX OF THE EARTH and FLOWERS FOR HITLER, which are read and quoted avidly by young people in Canada and the United States. (Awards: Toronto; New York; Philadelphia)
